name: fluffy 💜 (@fluffy@plush.city)
summary:
I wonder what’s happened that’s made me suddenly completely unhireable.

Back in 2019 I was given a provisional Senior Software Engineer offer from Mozilla but they had to rescind it because of their impending business meltdown. That’s understandable.

A month ago I applied for another Senior Software Engineer job there and reminded them of my provisional offer and it took them until today to respond with a “we are not moving forward with your application, but good luck in the future.”
